user_query: I'm planning a surprise party for my best friend's birthday. Can you suggest some recently added coins that I can gift to him? Also, find me a popular coin with a high marketcap to invest in. Additionally, provide me with a verse from the book of Psalms to include in the birthday card.

TaskList.description: Fetch a list of recently added cryptocurrencies.
Select a suitable gift from the recently added cryptocurrencies.
Fetch a list of popular cryptocurrencies with high market capitalization.
Select a popular cryptocurrency to invest in from the high marketcap list.
Retrieve a verse from the book of Psalms for the birthday card.
